idea-plugin.name: Service Invocation Monitor
idea-plugin.description:
This is a lightweight zero-intrusion link monitoring Idea plug-in, which can monitor the call chain of Junit and SpringBoot applications and count the time of interface methods. It can help developers to see the time of call chain more intuitively when debugging code.
github：https://github.com/caijianying/Service-invocation-monitor
idea-plugin.change-notes:
V1.0.0

  • Support monitoring junit use cases
  • Support SpringBoot application monitoring
  • Monitoring indicator: The time of the trace link
